Articles.Content:
Hi there!

Have you heard about that the kerbalstuff closed?

That is the reason why I`m started creating this new site: the "Beyond Kerbin"

This will be an mod hosting site just like Kerbalstuff. I know the CKAN team is working on their own site, but I had some ideas so I decided to try making my own site.

So the main idea is that you can install mods directly from the site (with a browser plugin). You just hit the install button and, POOF the mod immediately installs.

Currently work in progress, but I think it will be set up in a week or two, it depends on how much free time I get.

I will post updates here, stay tuned!

If you have any suggestions please send me an email: [email protected]

Link: http://beyondkerbin.co.nf/

 

UPDATE: First working prototype!!!! of course there is no UI and there are some functions are missing but the main part is working!

Update: Because nobody shows any interest for the site I won't make it.

 

Edited February 17, 2016 by Beyond Kerbin
I think the CKAN team are setting up a website, sapcedock.info . I'd call it Kerbal Space Dock though.

Hi guys!

Its 21:17 here in Hungary but I done for today.

I think I wont sleep at Friday and Thursday, but I think the official launch will be on the weekend!!
